text: George Costello Wolfe (born September 23, 1954) is an American playwright and movie-theatre director. He won a Tony Award in 1993 for directing Angels in America: Millennium Approaches and another Tony Award in 1996 for his direction of the musical Bring in 'da Noise/Bring in 'da Funk. He was Artistic Director of The Public Theater from 1993 until 2004. ==References== ==Other websites== * * George C. Wolf in the glbtq Encyclopedia * George C.
